title: Great company!!
text: They were very quick to respond to my emails. When I thought a delivery had gone missing. After dealing with USPS, I thought it had been stolen. They were quick to offer me a choice of solutions.  Turns out the husband had collected and forgot to inform his wife!! I didn't need a solution from them and was quick to let them know.  This company is very easy to deal with and I love their clothing!!

title: I love rotita clothes.
text: I love rotita clothes.It has incredible quality, the fabrics are exceptional.Furthermore, their designs are original and current.I love them from their dresses, pants, bikinis...

title: Had to return my order as too small
text: Had to return my order as too small, , live chat agent very helpful, so far impressed! hope the return goes well. UpdateThey did try to fob me off by offering store credit but have now refunded to my card and postage very reasonable, £3.99 , makes me think of using them again

title: I recently received my order - Fair Price, Great Quality
text: I recently received my order, and I was very pleased with the quality of the items. They were well-made and arrived in excellent condition.I would definitely recommend Rotita to others. Thank you for the great service!

title: I love this items very good quality and…
text: I love this items very good quality and best price ever

title: SUPER EASY RETURNS using Live Chat
text: Did a return using Live Chat. Was hesitant at first thinking I should have done this by e-mail but Live Chat return was soooo easy!!! They brought up the photos of my order and I chose what items to return, then they confirmed by showing me just those photos and then they provided me a Shipping Label that I copied off my phone and can print right away! This was way too easy!!! And my refund should come to me within the week. Will continue purchasing from this company and I had an excellent person do my return who was straight forward and not a lot of back and forth conversations! Quick and easy!!!

title: What you really excelled at with this…
text: What you really excelled at with this purchase was customer service!!  I had a few questions about my order and your agents were very understanding and patient.  Your rep was very familiar with your swimsuits and helped me determine the right cut and fabric type for my water aerobics suits.

title: Rotita does not disappoint.
text: Over the past few years, I have ordered many items from Rotita and I have never been disappointed. From swimsuits to shirts, the quality is exceptional. Every item I've received has been exactly as described and always fit true to size.

title: The ease at how the agent handled my…
text: The ease at how the agent handled my return, could not have done it without her help, thank you so much

title: These were my first orders from Rotita…What a GREAT experience!
text: These were my first orders from Rotita and I was skeptical of how the experience and quality would be. I was SO pleasantly surprised!! I absolutely LOVE all my items! They are adorable and such great quality. I have gotten so many compliments on each item so THANK YOU for such a fab experience. I will definitely be ordering more and more!!

title: easy to use site and great customer…
text: easy to use site and great customer service. Lots of modest wear and fun items to choose from

title: Excellent customer services in regards…
text: Excellent customer services in regards to returns

title: Very nice and helpful
text: Very nice and helpful. I had purchased a swim suit and needed a different size. So easy to return and get correct size..1st time I have interacted  with this company and have had very good experience.

title: The Chat Agent was great at fixing my…
text: The Chat Agent was great at fixing my problem. However your "ordering process via your website" is STILL HORRENDOUS!!!

title: Plus size clothing for us "full…
text: Plus size clothing for us "full figured" gals that is true to size, fits well and looks flattering.  I'm talking the 3 b's - b**bs, belly and butt.  Cute tops and wonderful bathing suit ensembles.  SUPER FAST shipping for a website business.  I'll be going back for more!

title: Trying to sign on as guest for return is difficult
text: I was very frustrated to try & get a return label so I decided to try live chat and the girl answered all of my questions & sent me a return label pretty quickly.  I only wish I would have tried that first.

title: I bought a swim suit last year still…
text: I bought a swim suit last year still looks brand new! I bought another color same style for this season! I recently had an issue with a discount being taken off they have went above and beyond getting it corrected!!

title: I enjoy all the clothes
text: I enjoy all the clothes, jewlery that is on sale at Rotita .com   . in Erie we cannot find besutiful clothes like you people display.. Besides I am getting older, and my body doesn;t want to  run around looking for lovely things.. You make it easier for us older group.  i WILL  continue shopping here,in the comfort of my own honme!!!

title: Rep was very helpful and patient
text: Rep was very helpful and patient. Service was quick and professional.

title: Every bathing suit I’ve gotten has been…
text: Every bathing suit I’ve gotten has been absolutely beautiful on! Very nice quality and a great but! I’ve gotten 7 this summer! I ordered some last year and they were great too but I’ve lost 128 pounds and I’m a size 4 but with a large top that’s my only complaint is the bottoms fit perfect but the tops not so much but that’s my fault! I will probably order more lol

title: Company gives refunds
text: Purchased 2 items and tried them on for 1 minute and returned them.  This is the message that I got back: "We have received the returned clothing item, unfortunately, it doesn't meet all of our return criteria (unworn, without stains, and undamaged). We are unable to process a refund for this return."  I contacted the company and they are now giving me a full refund.

title: Very happy as I was skeptical as I got…
text: Very happy as I was skeptical as I got burned from other companies and never received my product or refund.You were true to your word.  I place an order for 4 bathing suits which for some reason did not get the 4th free even though I put in promo code 4th free,  Besides that you said I would receive my pkg  by June 21/24- July 1st/24.  I received the pkg on June 20th/24 which I was over the moon happy.  I would definately order from yous again as finally A company I can trust.  Just one thing when you advertise 4th free can it be done somehow automatically as fir some reason when I put the code in didn't work so if the 4th is free maybe when we ard ordering it automatically comes up with the 4th free   I would hate to loose out on these deals because of a clique.  Thank you so much for being an honest company and I will let others know too.

title: Sowshi was very helpful in answering my…
text: Sowshi was very helpful in answering my question regarding one item that I ordered that was left out of my delivery Sowshi is kind, understanding, very Customer-Centric. I give Sowshi 5 STARS. ~ Elena Rains

title: Perfect fit
text: I purchased a two piece bathing suit that had a blouselike top and bottoms with a high waist.  The bottoms had the panties attached and they fix perfect.  The high waist was true to size and the material was light weight and did not sag to my knees when soaking wet getting out of the pool.  The material was nice and soft and I loved it.  Fit Perfect!!!

title: Love the material and the sizes fit…
text: Love the material and the sizes fit perfect I’ve always had problems fitting and feeling comfortable in bathing suits . Now since I found your site it will always be my go to ..

title: We have been so pleased with any items…
text: We have been so pleased with any items we have purchased from Rotita.  The quality of the material of the items that we have purchased have been great as is the actual correct sizing!  Never has been disappointed!

title: Customer service was prompt in…getting back to me quickly.
text: Customer service was prompt in answering my questions returning my swimsuit for a larger size I'm hoping it will be sent to me quicker that my original that took 21 on days to get to me. The suit was beautiful I will come back to purchase again.

title: Fantastic clothes
text: The clothing I ordered were well made. Not cheap. Fabric is great. Had to return a few items and experience was pleasant and quick. Highly recommend to everyone.

title: Review edited
text: II love the quality of the swimsuits I ordered.  They arrived a little late but customer service was awesome.  The order was expedited and I have them now.  Thank you for handling this request with care.

title: Excellent customer service!
text: I have always found customer service with Rotita is excellent.  I have made multiple purchases from them and the quality of the bathing suits in particular have been great. I would not hesitate to purchase from them.

title: Agent checked on my partial delivery…
text: Agent checked on my partial delivery and explained that the rest of my order will be expedited.  And that I will receive tracking information as soon as my other item is shipped.

title: I love the colors
text: I love the colors, the style and mostly the fit.  I have an unusual body type and these tops fit me so good; they don't sit on my backside, accentuating the size of my backside.

title: Easy ordering, accurate sizing chart
text: Ordering was easy but i placed an order because my last purchase with Rotita was successful. Sizing was great and that can be an issue when ordering online. Looking forward to receiving my next order.

title: Dresses, thousands of em !
text: Was looking for something easy to wear but not my usual blue.Saw a gorgeous yellow dress but flicking through found the pink one.I don't usually wear pink but this caught my eyeFits and hangs well, the lace adds a touch or class and I'm able to wear black underwearRotita is the best site of its sort, has a very wide range of clothes and caters to real sized people.Being on Klarna is a bonus.

title: The live chat is excellent the help me…
text: The live chat is excellent the help me every time when I need a return done or I have a question they are always there to answer!

title: I was looking for a tankini top I had…
text: I was looking for a tankini top I had seen last year but couldn’t find it so sent a message via Facebook Messenger and got a very quick response with a link to purchase it from.

title: As long as I get my credit this hour…
text: As long as I get my credit this hour long chat was worth it! Demi was very good at listening and hearing my concerns and trying to remedy them!

title: I love Rotita
text: I love Rotita!  Tummy coverage is important for me. Several choices from clothes, swimsuits, to dresses. Rotita makes it easy to order and a return items.

title: This tankini fit perfectly
text: This tankini fit perfectly, is very comfortable, I get a lot of compliments.  I loved it so much I bought it in 2 different colors.

title: Cloths
text: Every thing i hsve ordèréd for 2 years now ive never had any problems and all the cloths fit anf wear great

title: I order 6 swimsuits

title: Yes if this fits right yes I  will order another…
text: There dressed are beautiful and this dressI order is so different and just thinking how my body will fit YES AT 77 YEARS OLD THIS BODY GOING TO FIT NICE OH YES PLEASE I NEED IT BY MAY 15 MY WOMEN DAY CHURCH PROGRAM THANK YOU.

title: What great customer service I received…

title: Complete Satisfaction

title: Live Chat actually helpful, much better than other companies!
text: I couldn't find my return info and went on the Live  Chat. Real person on the other end. Found the info I needed so quickly. Sorted out my problem, exactly what I needed! Plus the clothes are such good quality and great sizes.

Shipping was not too bad to Canada, 2 weeks.  I was missing a bathing suit bottom, they were quick to respond to send them out.  I would definitely buy their product again.

title: Very good service.
text: I didn't get the package, and emailed Rotita. I got a response very quickly, and my next door neighbour came around with the package. It was in her black recycle box. Both boxes are side by side, so the driver did deliver, but to the wrong box. Many thanks.

title: The agent was so responsive and helpful…
text: The agent was so responsive and helpful - I was a little wary ordering online with a retail organization I never really heard of.  The clothing is awesome!  Just a pair of short too big and the agent was so helpful with the exchange.  I won't hesitate to buy further items with Rotita!

title: Great customer service
text: Date of experience: April 03, 2023

title: Ms. Brinda
text: Ms. Brinda she help me to look good at my son's wedding. And I thank her for that.

title: Shipping and attention has been great
text: Shipping and attention has been great. Everything very fast and correct.

title: This is my first time shopping  at…
text: This is my first time shopping  at Rotita and I love the product  I   received and the feed back that I have received  i will recommend the store to anyone who wants to buy quality  products products.

title: I was promised my order will be…
text: I was promised my order will be canceled  and refunded due to site error.

title: Happy Customer from Australia
text: I needed to use live chat for fast information, it was fantastic the response was really fast & extremely helpful and of course productive.  Well done Rotita

title: Absolutely AMAZING
text: I can't say enough about this company, customer service, and the items I have gotten.  Everything has been true to size, the customer service has gone above and beyond, and the shipping has been quick and easy.  Will definitely be purchasing again!!!

title: I have just received 2 Tankini
text: I have just received 2 Tankini, the delivery date was as stated, in fact a little earlier, quality is very good and sizing true to size, I have no complaints

title: I have never had to contact them before…
text: I have never had to contact them before and never had any issues. I was trying to find an outfit that I previously purchased but in a different color...did a chat and within minutes got the help I needed!!! 10 star service across the board!!!

text: Agent was very helpful and resolved my issue quickly!

title: Very helpful.
text: Date of experience: March 10, 2023

title: My first order and it arrived even…
text: My first order and it arrived even sooner than expected. Fit and quality of tankini and a top are excellent and colour as pictured. Will definitely place another order with this company and have recommended to others. Thanks Susie!

title: Return monies
text: Sowshi was extremely helpful with my trying to return my purchases.The only thing was I recieved little in return of the amount I spent.

title: Very helpful but
text: Very helpful but, I can’t leave feedback on the product or on the shipping until I actually receive the items.

title: Sowshi was a terrific help in changing…
text: Sowshi was a terrific help in changing my order shipment to priority so I have my outfits for My Carribean Vacation. THANK YOU!!!!!!

title: Items ordered received and was…
text: Items ordered received and was surprised how good the quality was. Use their measurements for sizing! Had to return one swimsuit and exchange process went smoothly. Customer service was quick in responding to my questions and in helping with return/exchange. Will definitely order again.

title: Fast and friendly customer service on a…
text: Fast and friendly customer service on a Saturday evening.

title: I wanted to thank Sowshi for how…
text: I wanted to thank Sowshi for how quickly she responded to me. She was so very pleasant and extremely helpful. Extremely happy with her. Thank you again Sowshi.

text: They were very quick to answer my questions. She double checked to make sure my order was correct and that I would receive in time

title: Great

Very knowledgeable and professional 👏 😘 I don't remember the name of the person that helped me but it was something like sousha, forgive me I know I butchered it. And I don't know the reference number.

text: The kindness of your staff. Your staff was polite and efficient with answering my questions. So very helpful.  Thank you.

text: Clara was awesome! quick, efficient and very helpful!  Never used your products before so I'm now even more excited for my goodies to arrive!  Certainly made my day!

title: Brinda was very helpful and prompt!
text: Date of experience: February 01, 2023

title: Customer service agent so kind and…
text: Customer service agent so kind and polite. I attempted to reach out on an item I ordered and had not received nor was it listed on my orders page, but I know I paid for it. The connection was immediate and my rep was the sweetest thing. I went back to get her my order # and got a notice of, you left something behind with a pic of my sweatshirt. I was completely embarrassed. They were very understanding, very kind! Thank you, Rotita!

title: Great customer service
text: Great customer service experience. Very kind, understanding, helpful and thorough.

title: I contacted Customer Service because I couldn't get a return ticket.
text: I contacted Customer Service because I have been unable to get a ticket to return my items because it kept saying my order was not there.  So I finally hit the chat and got Brinda who was absolutely awesome.  She found out that my order was under my old email address and that is why it wasn't coming up.  She found my order number and now I am able to do a ticket and return the items that do not fit me.  I was so excited to get results because I thought I was going crazy.   She told me exactly what to do in less than 5 minutes.  Great job Brinda.

title: contacted by shipping to be expedited - thank you
text: I contacted Rotita to get my shipment expedited and the help was excellent. Hope I get my order before Feb 10th so I can take my purchase to my vacation. Thank you so much :-)

title: Great Clothing
text: Renee was very good and processed everythingquickly.

title: I had ordered a top from Rotita
text: I had ordered a top from Rotita.  They had a backlog so I did not get it for Christmas.  I decided to cancel the order.  May was very helpful in getting me a refund.  It came through on Paypal quickly.  I did order a different sweater awhile back.  I got that one and have worn it 3 times.  I have received many compliments.  It’s a Christmas sweater and very cute and festive.

title: The customer service was exceptional
text: The customer service was exceptional. There was a delivery issue that was dealt with promptly and professionally. The garments are great value and lovely

title: Thanks Alice
text: My package got lost and my customer care representative (Alice) was very willing to assist. She replied in a timely manner, was professional as well as pleasant.

title: May made my Experience so Wonderful
text: May made my Experience so Wonderful! She went above and beyond to make sure I would receive my perfect size for my exchange! Her time and kindness is so very appreciated! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND ROTITA! High QUALITY clothing! EXTREMELY HAPPY with May in Customer Service! Thank you so very much!
